edu.uga.cs.recdawgs.entity

Interface ScoreReport

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Persistable

    public interface ScoreReport
extends Persistable
    This class represents a score report for a match between two teams in a sports league. One score report is submitted by each of the two team captains. If both score reports are the same, the score report becomes official and is recorded in the corresponding Match.
